title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.6 - Opening of sealed claim
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.6 - Opening of sealed claim

State Regulations

No official or other person shall open the sealed claim
box and envelope or give any information on claims filed except to check on the
potential claimant's license and eligibility of the claim. Otherwise, the claim
box and envelope shall remain unopened until after the results of the race are
made official. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4038.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
